Author: 509tellus
Text: I'd go for cauliflower or spinach or lentil curries since those will likely be the lowest calorie, tomato based sauces over creamy sauces. Most Indian restaurant dishes are generous with oil/ghee though, there's no way around it sorry

Author: ricebowlbitch
Text: anything lentil based is usually safe (on Indian menus it’ll say “Dal”) and soooo good. tandoori proteins are also pretty safe because they’re not cooked in as much oil. you can def ask the waiter what dishes are not oil or cream based, and pick from those! i recently went through something similar and got a lentil soup and some chickpea dish — overall tasted pretty good and i didn’t feel too bad afterwards. good luck!
